title: GNC Announces New Policy After Facing Scrutiny Over Mislabeled Products
teaser: After a probe by the New York Attorney General's office, GNC has announced major new testing and quality control procedures.
contentencoded:
After a probe by the New York Attorney General's office, GNC has announced major new testing and quality control procedures. The dietary supplement retailer recently faced allegations of mislabeling its products.
